typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		ProvinceID as integer,
		Population as long,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SourceDB
SourceDB sink(input(
		CityID as integer,
		CityName as string,
		ProvinceID as integer,
		Population as long,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		pop_sum as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table') ~> DestinationDB
